name: IX Battlegroup Blueprint Package
desc: A set of rare blueprints that enable heavy industry to produce the near-legendary hulls and weapons employed by the invading IX Battlegroup. Given the exceedingly tight information security of the Fleet, this chip is a priceless treasure that many would kill to obtain.

name: IX Honor Guard Blueprint Package
desc: A set of rare blueprints that enable heavy industry to produce the near-legendary hulls and weapons employed by the IX Battlegroup Honor Guard. Given the exceedingly tight information security of the Fleet, this chip is a priceless treasure that many would kill to obtain.
